titleStmt.title: The great mystery of godlinesse opened being an exposition upon the whole ninth chapter of the epistle of Saint Paul to the Romans / by the late pious faithful servant of Jesus Christ, Mr. Edward Elton.
titleStmt.author: Elton, Edward, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. for Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold in his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 130 misnumbered 132, p. 217-218 skipped in numbering.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
